body:
Okay first of all, i just realised the title may seem misleading, like I'm leaving the server or something, but its not that!
I would just like to thank EVERYONE who took their time to check out my Nebula Series Trailer on YouTube :) You know who you are is you're reading this and i am infinitely grateful to you all!
If you are slightly confused about what I'm talking about or haven't seen the trailer, here is a link, and please, be sure to leave a like and subscribe if you enjoyed it and would like to have a Nebula Series :D
Thank You All - OPTOBAT
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ad0ID1R2iak&list=UU6qZ9vdryr7m-4sS0i9kL3Q

replies.body: Ok, my main problem with your trailer is spamming the forums. I believe this is the final post (not sure though) and I have checked the comments on your video which adresses the PvP clips quality so, as long as you stop spamming the forums with more posts I'm fine with it. Hopefully you can find a better screen recorder and you might have a chance :). So GL HF (no sarcasm this time :P)

replies.body:
Okay. alright i think were cool now :) 
And yes i have definitely stopped making more posts, I'm going to stick to just one post for updates too :)
And I'm DEFINITELY getting rid of the watermarks and lag.
So for my next video, its going to be a lot better and if i end up making an trailer related to pvp i will try to make it more fighting, then sneaking, because lets be honest, about 90% of the PVP clips weren't proper pvp...
So thanks for clearing things up!
